text: Kana muchitya kuti hamukwanise kuita ruenzaniso pakati penherera-sikana, roorai vakadzi vamunoda, vaviri, kana vatatu, kana vana; asi kana muchitya kuti hamukwanise ruenzaniso pakati pavo, roorai mumwechete kana (varandakadzi) avo vamunochengetedza. Izvi zvinokwanisa kukuchengetedzai kubva muudzvanyiriri
